Question 101) The media can contribute to the solving of social problems, including that of child sexual violence. In this sense, advertising uses the nightmare metaphor to
A) Inform children victims of sexual abuse about the dangers of this practice, contributing to eradicate it.
B) denounce occurrences of sexual abuse against girls, with the aim of placing criminals in jail.
C) give the proper dimension of what sexual abuse is for a child, emphasizing the importance of the complaint.
D) highlight that child sexual violence predominates at night, which requires greater care of those responsible during this period.
E) draw attention to the fact that child abuse occurs during sleep, being confused by some children with a nightmare.
